connexion module¶

Module which has functions and classes to manage the connection and communication with the card

Functions:

ConnectSerial(self)

Try to connect the device and the software

put_cmd(frame, msg_cmd)

Send a Python command to the connected card

treeModel(frame)

Build the TreeView

Classes:

ManageConnection(frame)

Class with useful methods to manage Connection related with the frame
connexion.ConnectSerial(self)¶

Try to connect the device and the software

Returns

success flag

Return type

boolean

class connexion.ManageConnection(frame)¶

Bases: object

Class with useful methods to manage Connection related with the frame

Write bytes of a computer file on a file on the device
get_card_infos(msg_cmd)¶
Get the name, the version of the firmware and the type of the

connected device

Parameters

msg_cmd (string) – Result of a command

upload(filepath, filename)¶

Download a file on the card

Parameters

  • filepath (str) – path of the file to upload

  • filename (str) – name of the file to upload

Returns

success flag

Return type

boolean

upload_and_run(filename)¶

Execute the file gived in params on the MicroPython card

Parameters

filename (str) – the path of the file to execute

write_in_file(fileHandle, file_to_open)¶

Write bytes of a computer file on a file on the device

Parameters

  • fileHandle (file handled see :function: open()) – fileHandle to read

  • file_to_open (str) – device file
